name: Trash (itch) (Bence Mervay)
description:
What is the best way to protect nature? Should you strive for something seemingly grand but unsure, or do what you can to help your immediate neighbourhood?

This project was made for the Secret Santa Game Jam https://itch.io/jam/secret-santa.

I have tried out a lots of new things, including:

  • Dialogue writing (being able to present viable options that contradicted my personal views was actually more difficult than I thought)
  • Implementing a dialogue system (I used the free Fungus asset: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/game-toolkits/fungus-34184)
  • Animations (Characters are from Kenney, animations are from the Unity asset store and Mixamo) 
  • In-game cutscenes with Cinemachine
  • Using C# events in my codes
